data.message: Fuck you Eminem !! I would say I'll never buy another thing with your name on it but your washed up done so we don't have to worry about that!!!  crawl back in your hole !!!

replies.message: He's got more friends than you Michel... heartbreaking.

Lmao, another profile with the same name only spelled differently?  Michel instead of Mike? Clever! Nobody will ever catch on. Dude, you said that you couldn’t argue about politics cuz you didn’t know Michigan well enough, but you’re a real deal professional troll? Like, as in, you just randomly pop up to say some bullshit political (sometimes, so to be fair, I’ll also include brainwash) stuff and then bounce. So you’re a political troll that doesn’t know political stuff? Hey, mike... next time when you pick a name maybe try not to sound exactly like “McLovin”.

Matthew Kisser you obviously have me confused with someone one else  set the  crack pipe done  let the fog clear for a second !! I don't like to discuss politics and the last thing I need to do is hear about politics from some idiot  who raps about raping his own mother  talking about politics!! But if you want to take political advise from slim shady go ahead it shows how advanced you  all really are .
Hahaha it’s just ratings for bet’s garbage award show, who cares, I don’t at least
No one cares he already gave you the fuck you so move on!
If you're the kind that got angry about this, then he clearly disowned you first.

Geez Michel Flavin. You just apparently have a name that is popular enough to have two men of the same name then.. and around the same age, that both came here to bitch about Eminem and politics at the same time! Don’t worry asshole, nobody will scroll up and see the whole other post that by chance... you also came in to reply to my comments on at the same time AGAIN!... and didn’t even just comment either... both of you Mike Flavin’s also by chance started your own negative thread. Irony.
Pay no attention to the man behind that curtain!
Btw, I also called you out on your bullshit “Airborne” history on the other post that’s above. Let’s stop going back and forth.

Riggggghhhhhtttt... it’s not like he’s the king of rap for OVER two decades now. 

He will never not be relevant. Calm down .

Triggered Trump supporter lol

Fuck Donald Trump
